## {{< fa graduation-cap title="a graduation cap" >}} Data science and me

As a Statistics student at Universidade Federal do Espirito Santo, I have developed strong skills in manipulation, modeling, and interpretation of data across various domains. Currently, I am focused on visualizing public health data related to pregnant women as part of my work at the [Observatório Obstétrico Brasileiro](https://observatorioobstetricobr.org/) developed by [Daslab](https://daslab-ufes.github.io/). I'm actively involved with the [R-Ladies Vix](https://rladies.org/), a group dedicated in promotes gender diversity in the R community.

I'm naturally curious, and I believe my constant desire to understand the world around me is what drew me to this profession.

In addition to studying statistical theories and computational modeling, I'm also learning HTML and CSS to enhance the aesthetic quality of my interactive reports and dashboard panels.

To learn more about the projects I am involved in, please visit the following laboratory/organization websites:
